de.tum.in.bluetooth.discovery

Class BluetoothServiceDiscovery

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.tum.in.bluetooth.discovery.BluetoothServiceDiscovery

  • public class BluetoothServiceDiscovery
extends Object
    Component publishing ServiceRecord for all bluetooth services. This component consumes RemoteDevice services i.e all discovered bluetooth devices and gets all the bluetooth service profiles of each and every discovered device. For each bluetooth service profile, it publishes a ServiceRecord.
    Author:
    AMIT KUMAR MONDAL

      • stop

        @Deactivate
public void stop()
        Stops the discovery. All published services are withdrawn.

      • unbindRemoteDevice

        public void unbindRemoteDevice(javax.bluetooth.RemoteDevice device)
        A RemoteDevice disappears. If an OBEX service was published for this device, the service is unpublished.
        Parameters:
        device - the device
